meanings.definition: A type of marine animal belonging to the order Zoantharia.
meanings.sent1: The zoantharian in the aquarium has vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of zoantharians in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent3: The zoantharian decided to throw a party in its coral home.
meanings.sent4: The zoantharian colony is a bustling city under the sea.
meanings.sent5: Children love to learn about zoantharians during school trips to the ocean.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of zoantharians.
meanings.sent1: The zoantharian ecosystem is delicate and beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The diver observed the zoantharian creatures with fascination.
meanings.sent3: The zoantharian pattern on the fabric made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was as colorful and diverse as a zoantharian reef.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the essence of the zoantharian world in her painting.
